content:
{"name": "Grizzly Cupboard Cupboard", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Only for New York Tech Students
The Grizzly Cupboard is excited to announce our new software PantrySoft! This program allows us to streamline our processes and better serve our pantry users.

Long Island students: Use the PantrySoft link below to schedule a time to come to the Long Island pantry to select items.
New York City students: Use the PantrySoft link below to place an online order from our current inventory and select a day/time to pick up your order.
PantrySoft uses SSO, so you will use your New York Tech credentials to log in. Make your order or appointment here:

PantrySoft
If you have any questions or concerns please email bearbytesnyc@nyit.edu or bearbytesli@nyit.edu.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.nyit.edu/student_resources/bear_bytes", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "26 W 61st St, Room 007", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10023", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.77008, "longitude": -73.98318}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 261-1532", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Students & staff only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed during summer"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Student ID required"}]}
